short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Swap between dark and light mode in Facebook Messenger.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
⬇️ Easy to set up ⬇️:

1. Install and add the extension to Chrome.
2. Click on the extension and select your preferences from the 3 options/themes given.

✨ Features ✨

1. Choose between 3 themes: Charcoal, Midnight, and Deep Blue.
2. Toggle between system, light, or dark mode based on your device's setting.

Set dark mode for messenger easily with this extension.
